channel.title: Getting back into coding, using shard
channel.description:
So I'm trying to get back into RSPS coding and plan on creating a server in the future, I'm using a shard source for a base, just got a few little question to give me the basics with shards.
-How to change home -How to edit teleport spells -Confused about how drops work
*Example of drops: // rat {2682,2134,1,0},{2682,526,1,0},{47,2134,1,0},{47,526,1,0},{47,300,1,0},

item.title: Getting back into coding, using shard

So I’m trying to get back into RSPS coding and plan on creating a server in the future, I’m using a shard source for a base, just got a few little question to give me the basics with shards.
